article_title: East Coast Internet Traffic Is Restored
article_text:
Level 3 Communications Inc. said it fixed an Internet-service outage that left users from Brooklyn to Philadelphia with slow to nonexistent service for nearly 24 hours Saturday after equipment at a New York-area network hub broke down.

A spokesman for the Internet-service provider said Sunday that technicians worked quickly to resolve the outage, which cascaded down to customers using Cablevision Systems Corp.'s Optimum service and...
